RelatedSentence: ( AP ) - Six people are hospitalized after a woman driving a van with 11 other occupants fell asleep and ran off Interstate 20 .
( AP ) - Six people are hospitalized after a woman driving a van with 11 other occupants fell asleep and ran off Interstate 20 .
State Trooper Eric Henry says the wreck happened about five miles east of Vicksburg around 7:30 a.m. Monday , with the van rolling over and coming to rest in the eastbound lanes .
Henry says two boys were critically injured , one when he was ejected .
